review: I had difficulties connecting to my wifi and had intermittent connection to my phone and it was slow when it worked for the first half an hour before it died. I think it may have had overheating problems. I assumed at first it was just slow because of using a budget processor but after it died I can only imagine that I got a bad unit (hopefully).Afterwards I returned it with no issues and bought a more expensive roku 3 and that works flawlessly, but it is MUCH more expensive at $100 vs the $35 I think I paid for the chromecast. In my opinion its probably worth it to go with one of the more expensive box top sets like the roku 3, amazon fire tv, nexus player, or something similar with a more powerful processor that just works better.
